Name: Restore Plushie Village IV
Description: Finally, the restoration of the Plushie Village is complete! There will be a small celebration party and you're invited!
QuestDesc: Finally, the restoration of the Plushie Village is complete! There will be a small celebration party and you're invited!

Dialogues.Speaker: Apprentice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, don't waste food, you naughty Plushies!

Options.PlotLineKey: Old Bake is not coming back with you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Apprentice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, it's you. No need to be so serious—I'm just here to thank you for bringing Old Bake to this place the other day.

Dialogues.Speaker: Apprentice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was worried Old Bake might feel bad for not being able to make bread, but it turns out I was overthinking it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Apprentice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is great! Now it can really enjoy its retirement, living with the Plushies in the village like a grandpa surrounded by his grandchildren.

Dialogues.Speaker: Apprentice
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, please take all the Baton Bread, or the Plushies are just gonna waste it all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Through everyone's efforts, the Plushie Village is once again as lively as it used to be.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, {Male=Mr.;Female=Ms.} {PlayerName}, here you are.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you doing this remotely now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You see, some Echoes are still acting strange, even though we've restored the painting to its full power. I'm asking HQ to send more field investigators to get it sorted out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Honestly, things could have been a lot worse without your help!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Sonance Caskets you've collected have kept the village from falling apart along with the weakening painting. Otherwise, a lot more Echoes would be acting weird.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You gave me the chance to witness this beautiful scene where humans and Echoes live together in harmony.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, I need to look at it with a new perspective.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe it's a bit arrogant to think Echoes need to be tied to humans. The Echoes in Plushie Village have been supporting each other and have already found their own purpose in life.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, by the way, I have something for you, {Male=Mr.;Female=Ms.} {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Bells of Echoing Heart. The Plushies found them in the morph painting today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They're a pair. When you ring one, the other will echo, no matter how far apart they are.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Somehow, the Plushies are gathering around you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, looks like these little ones have figured out you're about to leave.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I think they gave you these bells to remind you that they’ll always be here for you, no matter how far you go. The bells will keep echoing the bond between you.

Options.PlotLineKey: You're really making me cry now!
Come on, this is not the last goodbye.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, perhaps it's Rinascita's plays that have made me a little more dramatic.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, Plushie Village will always welcome you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For now, let's just enjoy the party together!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (The frequency feels warm and strong. It seems the painting has been fully restored.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {Male=Mr.;Female=Ms.} {PlayerName}, happen to have any time to spare?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks to all your hard work, Plushie Village is completely restored! I'm throwing a party for the Echoes in two days. Be sure to come!
